Frank is presenting at NLUUG

07 May 2008

At this moment Frank Breedijk will be presenting at the NLUUG spring conference and releasing AutoNessus as open source.

His presentation and whitepaper (in Dutch) are online.

As soon as he is finished at the confrence the tarball will be uploaded to SourceForge.
